text: Jagat Prakash Nadda (born 2 December 1960) is an Indian politician and the President of the Bharatiya Janata Party since 20 January 2020. He is serving as the 34th Minister of Health and the 25th Minister of Chemicals and Fertilizers since 2024. He is also a Rajya Sabha member representing Gujarat. He was a Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA) from Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh, two times, from 2007 to 2012 and from 1993 to 2003. He also served as the Minister of Forest, Environment, Science, and Technology from 2007 to 2012, and as the Minister of Health and Family Welfare and Parliamentary Affairs from 1998 to 2003 in the Government of Himachal Pradesh. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Indian Hindus Category:Bihari politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Presidents of the Bharatiya Janata Party
title: J. P. Nadda
